channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The Best OTC Hearing Aids (2025), Tested and Reviewed
item.description: These WIRED-tested hearing aids are affordable alternatives to prescription devices. No doctor’s appointment necessary.

item.title: Gear News of the Week: There’s Yet Another New AI Browser, and Fujifilm Debuts the X-T30 III
item.description: Plus: Aura’s new digital photo frame goes wireless, a mood-morphing watch, Wyze and TP-Link unveil solar-powered outdoor security cameras, and Intel w...

item.title: OpenAI reportedly developing new generative music tool
item.description: Such a tool could be used to add music to existing videos, or to add guitar accompaniment to an existing vocal track, sources said.

item.title: Amazon Explains How Its AWS Outage Took Down the Web
item.description: Plus: The Jaguar Land Rover hack sets an expensive new record, OpenAI’s new Atlas browser raises security fears, Starlink cuts off scam compounds, and...

item.title: Baseus Inspire XC1 Review: Excellent Open Earbuds
item.description: These affordable open buds come with Bose-crafted sound.

item.title: TikTok robot star Rizzbot gave me the middle finger
item.description: About a week ago, I woke to a dizzying DM on Instagram — Rizzbot flipping me off. This sent me down a rabbit hole about humanoids in society.

item.title: Who are AI browsers for?
item.description: OpenAI launched an AI-powered browser this week, but it feels like it offers a slight efficiency gain at best.

item.title: India, the market BlaBlaCar once walked away from, is now its biggest
item.description: BlaBlaCar is seeing rapid growth in India, with 20 million passengers expected this year — up 50% from last year.

item.title: High school’s AI security system confuses Doritos bag for a possible firearm
item.description: A high school student in Baltimore County, Maryland was reportedly handcuffed and searched after an AI security system flagged his bag of chips as a p...

item.title: The 55 Best Shows on Netflix Right Now (October 2025)
item.description: Wayward, Haunted Hotel, and House of Guinness are just a few of the shows you need to watch on Netflix this month.
